content.en: Task scheduling: Researchers have been investigating different algorithms for scheduling tasks in computer systems. These algorithms aim to improve performance by reducing the time it takes to complete tasks and minimizing redundant duplications. By attributing agency to algorithms, researchers are able to develop strategies that optimize scheduling and resource consumption in heterogeneous computing systems.
content.da: Opgaveplanlægning: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer til planlægning af opgaver i computersystemer. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre ydeevnen ved at reducere den tid, det tager at fuldføre opgaver, og minimere overflødige dubleringer. Ved at tilskrive agentur til algoritmer er forskerne i stand til at udvikle strategier, der optimerer planlægning og ressourceforbrug i heterogene computersystemer.
